General.Name: Yunnan Chihong Zinc&Germanium Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Chihong Zinc & Germanium Co., Ltd. engages in the research, exploration, mining, smelting, processing, sale, and trading of minerals. It offers lead, zinc, gold, silver, germanium tetrachloride, zone melting germanium ingots, silver ingots, gold flakes, hot-dip galvanized alloy ingots, zinc ingots, lead ingots, rare and precious metals, and other products. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Qujing, China.
General.Address: Qujing Economic and Technological Develo, Qujing, China, 655011
